## FlowEditorState.applyMine() method

Gets a new flow editor state, based on the current state, and with the specified operation applied.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
applyMine(operation: FlowOperation, options?: ApplyMineOptions): FlowEditorState;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  operation | FlowOperation | The operation to apply |
|  options | [ApplyMineOptions](./scribing-react.applymineoptions.md) | Optional options that control how the operation is applied. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[FlowEditorState](./scribing-react.floweditorstate.md)
